comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: During the Inauguration festivities, Governor Thomas Riley Marshall of Indiana, the Vice President Elect, was accompanied by an honor guard of 60 black horse troop cadets from Indiana's Culver Military Academy. This photo shows Marshall and part of his entourage in front of the church he attended with his wife, Lois, on Sunday, March 2, 1913, two days before the Inauguration. Another photo in this Bain/LOC series shows Marshall with the same building in the background: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2616370928/in/p...
